title: Strategic Reading Competency Enhancement Course for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Terminology Comprehension and Business Document Interpretation Experience
context.additional_context: Combines smartphone-based mobile learning with offline workshops; assessment results are reflected in job performance.

learning_goals: Learners can summarize work-related mathematical texts with 80% accuracy and derive core concepts.
Learners can select strategic reading techniques (e.g., skimming, scanning) for problem-solving and develop an implementation plan.
Learners can analyze their reading strategy usage patterns through self-assessment reports based on surveys conducted at least three times weekly.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
